Reviews.Title: What a terrific machine!
Reviews.Author: Cogent Shopper
Reviews.Content: Super thin and all sorts of bells and whistles like a back-lit keyboard and a 10 point touchscreen and excellent sound!  SPEEDY delivery!  Yay for this great vendor!I've been using a computer for -- well, my first computer's operating system was DOS!  If you can figure out how to finagle your way around Windows 8, you can get this operating system to work like it was Windows 7 and have it boot directly to the desk top, yet with a swipe of the side of the screen, TaDAAAAH! you can pretend it's an android system and play Angry Birds!  But a full-blown gaming PC it is not, so set that dream aside.  But for a notebook PC, the 4 built in speakers with optimized volume and Dolby Sound are nothing short of amazing!  In other words, earbuds ARE optional!  No, it's not going to fill a whole room with reverberating stadium sound, but for a notebook computer, these speakers put out some pretty decent sound WITH volume.  It just doesn't have the processor speed for "action games" on the web, and while the screen is an actual 10 point touch screen, it also has all of the flaws of a narrow viewing angle desktop monitor, so don't expect to set it on the coffee table to watch Netflix with the family with any great success.  What this machine does allow me to do is do productive Microsoft Office work on it with MY software stored on MY 750 gigabyte hard drive (no cloud for serious work!) yet "be a toy" with the apps and 10 point touch screen games that most people play on their Android tablets.  Hey,  what could be better than that?  '-)

Reviews.Title: Acer Laptop
Reviews.Author: Cindi Simmons
Reviews.Content: Now that I have finally learned how to use Windows 8, I am enjoying this computer. I enjoy that I can use the touchscreen or the keyboard while on the web.

Reviews.Title: has no dvd-cd drive
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: if you only need it to go online or to do face book.  or online school work. this has the ports for usb stuff ( 4) but no dvd or cd drive which I did not pay attention to my self. the keys are very slippery or smooth so have to watch your typing other wise it works good it is a touch screen too but it does not come apart to be used as a tablet. it is a computer only just in case you were wondering the USB ports are 2 in the back one on each side of the keyboard and the on and off switch is on the side the left side not on the keyboard like all the computers I have ever had.  if there is something else you need to know let me know and I will try to answer if I can.  Oh and it cam three days early then they said it would so shipping for me was great.  4 stars do to no cd-dvd driveUpdateIt is the first of June and it now has a blank screen, have E-mail the seller being a Sunday it might be a while until I hear back. Will keep you updated on how it goes and what and how this seller deals with problems. And this was ship to a VA address so can not say how fast it would have gotten to WA statewell after an hr the screen came back on by it self not sure what the problem was or is but it is now working again.one other thing when I type on here if my finger or thumb goes over the mouse pad it will move the line of type to the middle of the sentence and mess it up so as others have said you have to be careful when typing. I am a guy who looks where he is typing and not up so by the time I have looked up I am starting all over again LOL  the plug does come out and still look like it is in so have to watch for that may only be mine but just something to check on I have too. will be updating as i think of things of importants.

Reviews.Title: Refurbished and works great
Reviews.Author: Ryan Scobey ""its better to look ugly and...
Reviews.Content: Hard to beat a deal like this, I would recommend this laptop to anyone that needs a casual laptop or gaming laptop.

Reviews.Title: Love this laptop!
Reviews.Author: Donald Feld
Reviews.Content: For being as thin as it is and granted it's a 15.6-inch screen, it is a little hefty. I love this laptop! I'm still getting used to the touch screen stuff and Windows 8, but the multi-touch screen works very well. the speakers on this thing work awesome, sounds really good. The light up key board was a nice surprise, makes for typing in low light and the dark great. I bought this computer refurbished and I have no complaints yet.

Reviews.Title: acer
Reviews.Author: Antonio Vazquez
Reviews.Content: hello!this computer its very nice! 100% working. and your design its perfect for me and my workso thanks

Reviews.Title: First touch screen
Reviews.Author: S. Rush "Sooner"
Reviews.Content: This was a refurbished unit and it was good purchase.  First touch screen laptop for me and it makes Windows 8.1 so much more enjoyable. Meets all expectations and more...

ProductInfo.Features:
Less than 1" thin - Comes with Latest Generation Intel Pentium 2117U Dual Core Processor (1.8GHz)
6GB DDR3 memory (Expandable up to 12GB) - 750GB hard drive
15.6" HD widescreen CineCrystal multi-touch LED-backlit display (1366 x 768) - 10-point multi-touch control (supporting 10 finger touch) - Intel HD Graphics - Mobile Intel HM77 Express chipset
HD Audio + Dolby Advanced Audio v4 enhancement with 4 integrated stereo speakers and integrated microphone; Gigabit Ethernet; Wireless IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n; HD Webcam(1280 x 720); multi-gesture touchpad; Bluetooth 4.0 + HS
HDMI Port with HDCP Support; USB 3.0 (2-USB 2.0 Ports and 1-USB 3.0 Port with Power-off Charging); Card reader; Up to 5-hour battery (varies depending settings and usage); Windows 8-64bit. Color: Steel
ProductInfo.Name: Acer V5-572P Ultra Thin Touchscreen Laptop Latest Generation Intel Pentium Dual Core Processor 6GB 750GB 15.6" HD LED CineCrystal Multi-Touch Display Webcam WiFi Bluetooth 4.0 + HS USB 3.0 HDMI Windows 8 Dolby Home Theater + HD Audio with 4 Built-in Speakers (Cold Steel)
